name: Pizza Boys
description:
You control a Scooter which carries Hot Pizza on its back. In this top down, with 3D models, endless scroller your goal is to throw the Pizza at the targets. By pressing Q or E the turret will rotate to each side of the road. Space or LMB will shoot at your targets, correct hits will net positive score but if you run out of time or money the game will be over.

This project was made during my course "Unity Learn - Junior Programmer C#" and is my first fully developed game.

Performance: It runs poorly in browser use standalone player instead.
